main.name: Leo Salazar
main.description: Dedicated and passionate, interested in computer science since a very young age with 6 years of working experience
main.bio:
Dedicated and passionate, interested in computer science since a very young age with 6 years of working experience. Able to develop in multiple areas, great versatility and expertise in several scopes, such as web development, teaching and customer services.
Social and logical abilities that help for troubleshooting, always ready to learn something new and willing to sort out adversities even under a lot of pressure. All of this adds up to being a role model, always delivering the best and encouraging everyone to do the same.

resume.skillmessage: This are some of my skills!

work.title: VR & AR ENGINEER
work.description: Creating more interactive content for one of the most important museums in Torreón, Coahuila. Promoting the use of new technologies such as VR & AR for delivering great experiences as you learn having fun.

work.title: WEB DEVELOPER
work.description: Angular and .NET development for a school management system, creating APIs and WebServices that connects to an SQLDatabase. Testing and improving every component in the system delivering great performance.

work.title: ROBOTICS MENTOR
work.description: In charge of a group of 5 high school students who are the mexican selection for an international competition held in Dubai, helping them with programming manners as well as consolidating an effective team work.

work.title: ROBOTICS COACH
work.description: Coach of a rookie team formed by 15 9th graders which won the Control Award and National Winner Award, recognized for being outstanding in automatization manners for a competing robot and achieving the Championship Pass.

work.title: LEGO COACH
work.description: Mentor of a small amount of kids, all of them with ages from 12 to 14. Teaching them how to make investigations and to be assertive on the resolution of problems.

work.title: ROBOTICS MENTOR
work.description: Teaching classes of basic programming with LabView and Java for the control and automatization of mechanisms for the Chairman's Award Winner team in the FIRST Robotics Competition. With the duty to teach all the learning lived as a founder member of the team in 2012. Participated in the Championship for 3 consecutive years since 2017.

work.title: VIDEOGAME DEVELOPER
work.description: Engineering educational videogames for a web platform using only HTML5, CSS3 and Javascript, guaranteeing the best performance online as the developed games use very little resources.

work.title: WEB DEVELOPER
work.description: In charge of the development of entertaining apps for a web platform using Javascript, HTML5 and CSS3 through the second semester of 2015. In charge of the management and development of an administrative system for the teachers and financial manners of a school. Also developed a Java Desktop Application for generating dynamic web pages.

work.title: WEB DESIGNER
work.description: Designed a web site using Adobe Muse planning the structure of the page being ready to escalate and easy to use for the client and adminitrator, as well as defining the site identity and colors.

work.title: WEB DEVELOPER
work.description: Developed a live chat for a web site and used jQuery and CSS for styling and animating the content of an educational platform which was used by the SEP (Secretaría de Educación Pública) on Yucatán.

projects.title: My own Resume with Bootstrap
